an8.5:1.1: “Atthime, bhikkhave, lokadhamma lokam anuparivattanti, loko ca attha lokadhamme anuparivattati.
an8.5:1.3: Labho ca, alabho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, ninda ca, pasamsa ca, sukhanca, dukkhanca.
an8.5:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha lokadhamma lokam anuparivattanti, loko ca ime attha lokadhamme anuparivattatiti.
